<lg xml:id='Bhall_1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tāṃ bhavānīṃ bhavānīta</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kleśanāśaviśāradām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śāradāṃ śāradāmbhoda</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>sitasiṃhāsanāṃ namaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_2'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kurvanti ye divasajanmamahotsaveṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sindūrapāṭalamukhīr iva dikpurandhrīḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_3'>

<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>caurā ivātimṛdavo mahatāṃ kavīnām</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>arthāntarāṇy api haṭhād vitaranti śabdāḥ</seg> //</l>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>māne necchati vārayaty upaśame kṣmām ālikhantyāṃ hriyāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svātantrye parivṛtya tiṣṭhati karau vyādhūya dhairyaṃ gate</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sadvṛttayaḥ sadasadarthavivekino ye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>te paśya kīdṛśam amuṃ samudāharanti</seg> </l>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pātaḥ pūṣṇo bhavati mahate nopatāpāya yasmāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kāle prāpte ka iha na yayur yānti yāsyanti vāstam*</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāvat tu vyathayatitarāṃ lokabāhyais tamobhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tasminn eva prakṛtimahati vyomni labdho 'vakāśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_16'>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyunnativyasaninaḥ śiraso 'dhunaiṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasyaiva cātakaśiśuḥ praṇayaṃ vidhattām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asyaitad icchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḥ svacchaśītamadhurāḥ kva nu nāma nāpaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Bhall_18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>atyunnati-vyasaninaḥ śiraso 'dhuna aiṣa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svasya eva cātaka-śiśuḥ praṇayaṃ vidhattām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asya etad icchati yadi pratatāsu dikṣu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tāḥ svaccha-śīta-madhurāḥ kva nu nāma nā apaḥ</seg> //</l>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'pūrvaḥ rasanāviparyayavidhis tat karṇayoś cāpalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadik kiṃ bhūyasoktena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itthaṃ niścitavān asi bhramara he yad vāraṇo 'dyāpy asā*</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥśūnyakaro niṣeyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Bhall_19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>so 'pūrvaḥ rasanā-viparyaya-vidhis tat karṇayoś cāpalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dṛṣṭiḥ sā mada-vismṛta-sva-para-dik kiṃ bhūyasa ūktena vā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>itthaṃ niścitavān asi bhramara he yad vāraṇo 'dya apy asā*</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>antaḥ-śūnya-karo niṣeyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tad vaidagdhyaṃ samucitapayastoyatattvaṃ vivektuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saṃlāpās te sa ca mṛdupadanyāsahṛdyo vilāsaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>āstāṃ tāvad baka yadi tathā vetthi kiṃ cic chlathāṃsas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tūṣṇīm evāsitum api sakhe tvaṃ kathaṃ me na haṃsaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='Bhall_21'>
